ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 80
ygData.msgSnippet: I d recommend lanterns till 65 or so. They are easier to make and sell well back to the merchants while skewers at 40 will be 95% failures. Lanterns are a bit
ygData.messageBody:
I'd recommend lanterns till 65 or so. They are easier to make and sell well back to the merchants while skewers at 40 will be 95% failures. Lanterns are a bit of a pain to make but at least you
make something you can sell back or even sell or give to newbies

Andric d'Regor
Karana

<snip>
I just made 40 in smithing. I tried to research what to do next, but I am finding conficting information. Should I be making lanterns or skewers now? Or should I be making something else?

>
> Thanks very much for your help,
> -Sarah
>
